name.baseName: Rare earth oxides site preparation;Rare earth oxides;ion-adsorption process;ion-adsorption clays
稀土氧化物场地准备;稀土氧化物;离子吸附工艺;离子吸附粘土

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process described is utilized for the production of mixed rare earth oxides (REOs) from ion-adsorption clays found in Southern China. These oxides are subsequently used in various high-tech industries such as electronics, renewable energy technology, and aerospace. The REOs produced through this process are of 90-92% purity and serve as critical components in manufacturing permanent magnets, catalytic converters, and other specialized applications where rare earth elements are essential.
该过程用于从中国南方的离子吸附粘土中生产混合稀土氧化物（REOs）。这些氧化物随后在电子、可再生能源技术和航空航天等高科技行业中被使用。通过此过程生产的REOs纯度为90-92%，并在制造永磁体、催化转化器及其他需要稀土元素的专门应用中作为关键部件。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is defined as the production of 1 kg of 90–92% purity mixed REOs by the in-situ leaching method from ion-adsorption clays in southern China.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The process ends at mixed rare earth oxides and downstream processes such as solvent extraction and metal production are not included in the system boundary. At certain sites further processing may occur (e.g., separating REEs into light and groups).
该过程以混合稀土氧化物结束，下游过程（例如溶剂萃取和金属生产）不包括在系统边界内。在某些地点可能会进行进一步处理（例如，将稀土元素分为轻质和组）。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is utilized for the production of mixed rare earth oxides (REOs) from ion-adsorption clays found in Southern China. These oxides are subsequently used in various high-tech industries such as electronics, renewable energy technology, and aerospace. The REOs produced through this process are of 90-92% purity and serve as critical components in manufacturing permanent magnets, catalytic converters, and other specialized applications where rare earth elements are essential.
该过程用于从中国南方的离子吸附粘土中生产混合稀土氧化物（REOs）。这些氧化物随后在电子、可再生能源技术和航空航天等高科技行业中被使用。通过此过程生产的REOs纯度为90-92%，并在制造永磁体、催化转化器及其他需要稀土元素的专门应用中作为关键部件。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: In this study, the material and energy flow data is gathered from Chinese literature and verified through personal communications with Chinese experts working in this industry. These datasets are derived based on attributional modeling (instead of consequential) and for most multi-products processes economic allocation is used. Since the data was collected from different sources

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Vahidi, E., Navarro, J. & Zhao, F. An initial life cycle assessment of rare earth oxides production from ion-adsorption clays. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 113, 1–11 (2016).
Vahidi, E., Navarro, J. & Zhao, F. An initial life cycle assessment of rare earth oxides production from ion-adsorption clays. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 113, 1–11 (2016).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset, ensure that the system boundary excludes downstream processes such as solvent extraction and metal production. Use this data for attributional modeling purposes and apply economic allocation for multi-product processes. Be aware that the data sources are varied, including Chinese literature and expert communications. The defined functional unit for the assessment is the production of 1 kg of mixed REOs with a purity of 90-92% through the in-situ leaching method from ion-adsorption clays in Southern China. Incorporate further processing variations, such as separation into light and heavy rare earth elements, as per the specifics of the given site.
使用此数据集时，请确保系统边界不包括溶剂萃取和金属生产等下游过程。将此数据用于归因建模目的，并对多产品过程应用经济分配。意识到数据来源是多种多样的，包括中国文献和专家沟通。评估的功能单元定为使用原位浸出法从中国南方的离子吸附粘土中生产1公斤纯度为90-92%的混合REOs。根据具体现场情况，加入分离成轻稀土和重稀土元素的进一步处理变量。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: PVC pipes (Materials/Processes) The original text did not note which type of PVC
PVC pipes (Materials/Processes) 原文未备注哪种PVC
